ScriptLine.Text: Li Kalòcè̌ mè mwaǐ Pò̌lu tyanba Wein Kalòcè̌ ta-aòblonphao.
ScriptLine.Heading: false

ScriptLine.Text: Wein Kalòcè̌ ǔ mè aò bǎ Kǎn Asǐyǎ, Wein Ěphěsu amô̌nhtan dò aò dô̌ Rǒme tapain kalǎ.
ScriptLine.Heading: false

ScriptLine.Text: Bǎ Ěpaphra laitaû̌ dô̌ Wein Ěphěsu dò nāhyû̌nba Pò̌lu tadaòhtulan khǎ, anǎn yû̌ htaû̌dò cein daòhtulanba saô dô̌ Wein Kalòcè̌ dò akaphrî̌ kacòn.
ScriptLine.Heading: false

ScriptLine.Text: Dò anǎnthû̌ yû̌ dô̌ Khrī Yesyǔ mè, mwaǐ anǎnthû̌ Tadau.
ScriptLine.Heading: false

ScriptLine.Text: Bǎnu sô̌nkhǎ kaǔ nu, pradaòhtulan thwanlǔ ta dô̌ ahtandidaò dò Pò̌lu atadaòhtulan thwanlǔ lahan laitaû̌ dô̌ Wein Kalòcè̌ ta-aòblon.
ScriptLine.Heading: false

ScriptLine.Text: Dò thwanlǔ tha-ǔ, “Cwaǐdò ka theingǎ da Bweca dò ka nî̌ba bábwaǐ tahtairaò́ angǎ nu, ba thabǎhtan yaò araû̌raû̌ dò macǔ tahtǒn bakyadò tadurîphei rǎ, pwè̌lǎn rǎ, ta-an ta-aò̌ rǎ dò takaru araû̌raû̌.”
ScriptLine.Heading: false

ScriptLine.Text: Dò mwaǐdô̌ tathwanlǔ ǔkaǔ akhaucǎ mè magwû̌n anǎnthû̌ tayû̌ da.
ScriptLine.Heading: false

ScriptLine.Text: Akhaucǎ, Pò̌lu taiba anǎnthû̌ dô̌ Bweca phaokhaǔ Khrī Yesyǔ mè, mwaǐ Bweca yònyǎn, a-aò rî̌kaò̌ dò ta-baòlan pǔ raû̌ dò htǔkhau dô̌ ta pǔ raû̌ kakhau arîkaǐ.
ScriptLine.Heading: false

ScriptLine.Text: Dò Bweca daûlaô̌ atamapǐ takrautayaò araû̌raû̌ mwaǐdô̌ Khrī Yesyǔ thû̌ dò thamyû̌ncein akhaucǎ.
ScriptLine.Heading: false

ScriptLine.Text: Dò mwaǐdô̌ pa yû̌ Khrī Yesyǔ akhaucǎ, pa nî̌ba tahtairaò́ dò pa mapǐ da yaò araû̌ raû̌ dò cô̌ lo macǔ pè tahtǒn tadaû kǒ.
ScriptLine.Heading: false

ScriptLine.Text: Dò sankǎn anǎnthû̌ dô̌ tayû̌ kaba cein leǐn dò kaba swaǐrain pradaòhtulan thwanlǔ ta dô̌ ahtandidaò dò Pò̌lu tathwanlǔ ǔkaǔ.
ScriptLine.Heading: false

ScriptLine.Text: Dò sankǎn anǎnthû̌ dô̌ ta karu araû̌raû̌ dô̌ kaba aòmyû̌n dô̌ ta-aòkǎn athû̌ thamǎ arîkaǐ.
ScriptLine.Heading: false
